column2: Colony expansion refused
Our colonial overlord recently refused to allow us to expand.
Slavery question cooldown
The subject of slave emancipation came up on the national stage recently.
Demanded Constitutional Reform
There is a considerable amount of tension in the Empire, as the colonial overlord has demanded that the colonies conform more closely to the constitutional arrangements of the metropole.
Centre of the Revolution
$COUNTRY$ is the current centre of revolutionary thought.
Treaty Port Cooldown
$COUNTRY$ recently demanded a Treaty Port from another power. We should probably give it a rest for a while.
Progressive Administration
We have decided to carry on with the Ming tradition of technological advancement, to the displeasure of the reactionaries.
Reactionary Administration
We have decided to abandon the Ming tradition of technological advancement, to the displeasure of the liberals.
Local residential school
This province is home to a residential school for the "re-education" of indigenous children. I wonder what our grandkids will think of this practice?
Residential school system
We operate a number of residential schools for the "re-education" of indigenous children. I wonder what our grandkids will think of this practice?
Refused residential school systems
We did the right thing and refused to snatch indigenous people's children with the aim of converting them to our culture. Yay us!
Residential school systems are bad, actually
A recent report revealed the vast scale of emotional and physical devastation inflicted by our residential school system for indigenous people.
Dreaming of a different Austria
The Revolution may have been unsuccessful in 1821, but the spirit of republicanism lives on.
Revolutionary republic
The Revolution has been won, and the government can expect a short grace period to get the house back in order after all the chaos.
Esprit Marguerittiste
The zealotry of Marguerite of Anjou, much like the memories of the glorious conquests of heir regency, lives on.
